_comment: This is an example service account configuration(Use the top config, add your details). Replace placeholders with actual values.
_comment_project_id: Replace 'your-project-id' with your actual GCP project ID.
_comment_private_key_id: Replace 'your-private-key-id' with the unique key ID for your service account.
_comment_private_key: Replace 'YOUR-PRIVATE-KEY' with your actual private key. Keep this secure!
_comment_client_email: Replace with your service account's email address.
_comment_client_id: Replace 'your-client-id' with your service account's client ID.
_comment_security: Ensure this file is stored securely and avoid committing it to public repositories.
